metadata.title: CVE-2021-40732 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
XMP Toolkit version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by a null pointer dereference vulnerability that could result in leaking data from certain memory locations and causing a local denial of service in the context of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the victim will need to open a specially crafted MXF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-40732` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.5.2-1ubuntu0.21.10.1
libexempi8 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> fixed in adobe's 2021.08 code drop

criterions.comment: exempi package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu0.21.10.1').
